name: Microvania
summary:
Microvania is a short metroidvania game developed by BluebsTopCat where you play as a wizard where each keyboard button is an upgrade that will give you new abilities to explore the game map in search of a mysterious item.

The game is simple but enjoyable. It has fluid gameplay and reasonable physics for an adventure game. Your goal is to acquire new skills and use them to access new areas that are increasingly complex and challenging.
